Portal Clone

Gameplay Programmer

November 2024 - December 2024

Project Team: None

Genre: First-Person Puzzle Game

Engine: None (Visual Studio Code)

Version Control: Github

Coding Language: C++

Special Skills: None

A clone of Portal created as the final project of ITP-380, USC's Game Programming Class.

As a Gameplay Programmer I was responsible for:

  • Programming 3d movement and a first-person perspective using quaternion math
  • Creating portal teleportation that preserved momentum and character rotation (relative to the point of entry)
  • Creating various gameplay objects (doors/cubes/energy balls) to use in puzzles
  • Creating an audio manager to play sound effects (with falloff distance) and voice lines upon object proximity or trigger activation
